response.overview: Thomas Anderson hasn’t achieved much in life and this lack of desire and ambition doesn’t seem to bother the short-tempered Thomas. On the morning of Thomas’s 21st birthday,Damon, Thomas’s successful dad, threatens to kick Thomas out of the family home if Thomas doesn’t start to pay off his overdue debt by the end of the week. Leading Thomas to roam the streets of Manchester finding any way possible to get the money creating a birthday that he will never forget.
response.title: Is This It?
